info.title: rainmaker.distribute v.1.0
info.description: Documentation for rainmaker.distribute HTTP JSON-based API version 1.0

post.description:
Register new user in system if provided email is not present.

**NOTE**: We are allow users to have access immediately after registration without email confirmation, but we are block some features for non-confirmed users.

Require `user` object.

|Field|Type|Details|
|-----|----|-------|
|email|`STRING`|Unique valid email address.|
|name|`STRING`|Non empty string with representation user name|
|password|`STRING`|String with any symbols with length at least 8 symbols|
|password_confirmation|`STRING`|String with any symbols, should be equal to `password`|

All fields is required.

Success Response
Returns `session` object

|Field|Type|Details|
|-----|----|-------|
|token|`STRING`|JWT access key, should be used as authroization key|
|email|`STRING`|User email address|

meta.message: You are successfully logged in! Add this token to authorization header to make authorized requests.

Register new user in system if provided email is not present.

**NOTE**: We are allow users to have access immediately after registration without email confirmation, but we are block some features for non-confirmed users.

|Field|Type|Details|

post.description:
Authenticate user and receive JSON Web Token.

Require `user` object.

|Field|Type|Details|
|-----|----|-------|
|email|`STRING`|Unique valid email address.|
|password|`STRING`|String with any symbols with length at least 8 symbols|

Success Response

Returns `session` object

|Field|Type|Details|
|-----|----|-------|
|token|`STRING`|JWT access key, should be used as authroization key|
|email|`STRING`|User email address|

Error Response

If system can't authenticate user by passed credentials, we are everything return `401 Unauthorized` error.
```
{
  "errors": {
    "title": "Unauthorized",
    "code": "unauthorized"
  }
}
```

meta.message: You are successfully logged in! Add this token to authorization header to make authorized requests.

post.description:
Request send restore password instructions to email.

Require `user` object.

|Field|Type|Details|
|-----|----|-------|
|email|`STRING`|Valid email address|

For security reasons this endpoint everything response with `200 Success` status code.

Response everything return only `meta` object with human readable `message`.

meta.message: Instructions to restore password was send successfully!

post.description:
Setup new password via restore password process.

## Request

Require `user` object.

|Field|Type|Details|
|-----|----|-------|
|restore_password_token|`STRING`|Restore password token|
|password|`STRING`|String with any symbols with length at least 8 symbols|
|password_confirmation|`STRING`|String with any symbols, should be equal to password|

## Success Response

Response returns only `meta` object with human readable `message`.

```
{
  "meta": {
    "message": "Password was restored!"
  }
}
```

## Error Response

For security reasons, if system catch some errors on restore password process, they return `400 Bad Request` response.
```
{
  "errors": {
    "title": "Bad Request",
    "code": "bad_request"
  }
}
```

Return success response with code `200 OK` or error `404 Not Found`.

tags.name: Hotels Collection
tags.description:
This resource collection provide methods to manage hotels associated with authenticated User.

Hotel type is `hotel`.

## Hotel Attributes

|Field|Type|Description|
|-----|----|-----------|
|id|`UUID`|Hotel Unique Identificator|
|title|`STRING`|Hotel title|
|is_active|`BOOLEAN`|Current hotel status marker|
|queue_length|`INTEGER`|Count of issues at Hotel Actor Queue|
|is_busy|`BOOLEAN`|Current Hotel Actor status|

```
{
    "type": "hotel",
    "id": "4d981378-9184-494b-927d-c11fe74abae8",
    "attributes": {
        "id": "4d981378-9184-494b-927d-c11fe74abae8",
        "title": "test",
        "is_active": true,
        "queue_length": 0,
        "is_busy": false
    }
}
```

tags.name: Room Types Collection
Rate Plans Collection
tags.description:
This resource collection provide methods to manage Rate Plans.

Rate Plan type is `rate_plan`.

## Rate Plan Attributes

|Field|Type|Description|
|-----|----|-----------|
|id|`UUID`|Room Type Unique Identificator|
|hotel_id|`UUID`|Reference to parent Hotel|
|room_type_id|`UUID`|Reference to parent Room Type|
|parent_rate_plan_id|`UUID`|Reference to parent Rate Plan (only for derived Rate Plans)|
|title|`STRING`|Rate Plan title|
|rate|`[INTEGER]`|Default Rate values for 7 days|
|min_stay_arrival|`[INTEGER]`|Default Min Stay Arrival values for 7 days|
|min_stay_through|`[INTEGER]`|Default Min Stay Through values for 7 days|
|max_stay|`[INTEGER]`|Default Max Stay values for 7 days|
|closed_to_arrival|`[BOOLEAN]`|Default Closed To Arrival values for 7 days|
|closed_to_departure|`[BOOLEAN]`|Default Closed To Departure values for 7 days|
|stop_sell|`[BOOLEAN]`|Default Stop Sell values for 7 days|
|occ_adults|`INTEGER`|Max Adults Occupancy|
|occ_children|`INTEGER`|Max Children Occupancy|
|occ_infants|`INTEGER`|Max Infants Occupancy|
|max_sell|`INTEGER`|Max sell for one date|
|max_availability|`INTEGER`|Max availability for one date|
|currency|`STRING`|3 Symbols Currency code|
|inherit_stop_sell|`BOOLEAN`|Inherit stop sell values from parent rate|
|inherit_rate|`BOOLEAN`|Inherit rate values from parent rate|
|inherit_min_stay_through|`BOOLEAN`|Inherit min stay arrival values from parent rate|
|inherit_min_stay_arrival|`BOOLEAN`|Inherit min stay through values from parent rate|
|inherit_max_stay|`BOOLEAN`|Inherit max stay values from parent rate|
|inherit_closed_to_departure|`BOOLEAN`|Inherit closed to departure values from parent rate|
|inherit_closed_to_arrival|`BOOLEAN`|Inherit closed to arrival values from parent rate|
|derived_options|`JSON`|Derived options to modify inherited values|

```
{
    "type": "rate_plan",
    "relationships": {
        "room_type": {
            "data": {
                "type": "room_type",
                "id": "c0d3f3d0-ae57-4b3d-9014-bf143e094765"
            }
        },
        "hotel": {
            "data": {
                "type": "hotel",
                "id": "4d981378-9184-494b-927d-c11fe74abae8"
            }
        }
    },
    "id": "2d886f45-92ef-4b77-9f71-5ac3fc9d1c1f",
    "attributes": {
        "title": "Test Rate Plan",
        "stop_sell": [
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false
        ],
        "rate": [
            100,
            100,
            100,
            100,
            100,
            100,
            100
        ],
        "occ_infants": 0,
        "occ_children": 0,
        "occ_adults": 1,
        "min_stay_through": [
            1,
            1,
            1,
            1,
            1,
            1,
            1
        ],
        "min_stay_arrival": [
            1,
            1,
            1,
            1,
            1,
            1,
            1
        ],
        "max_stay": [
            0,
            0,
            0,
            0,
            0,
            0,
            0
        ],
        "max_sell": null,
        "max_availability": 10,
        "inherit_stop_sell": false,
        "inherit_rate": false,
        "inherit_min_stay_through": false,
        "inherit_min_stay_arrival": false,
        "inherit_max_stay": false,
        "inherit_closed_to_departure": false,
        "inherit_closed_to_arrival": false,
        "id": "2d886f45-92ef-4b77-9f71-5ac3fc9d1c1f",
        "derived_option": null,
        "currency": "USD",
        "closed_to_departure": [
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false
        ],
        "closed_to_arrival": [
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false,
            false
        ],
        "availability_offset": null
    }
}
```
